context.p: Users can configure the component update schedule for the StellarProtect agents via StellarOne webconsole. So the system can run component update automatically at users' assigned time frequency.

step.cmd: Under Policy tab, switch on the Schedule Update toggle under Agent Component Update Schedule.

note.p: It is suggested to determine the agent's component update schedule by referring to the StellarOne console's component update schedule setting first.

step.cmd: (Optional) Click StellarOne scan component update shcdule and view the current settings of StellarOne's component update schedule.

note.p: Only users logged in with adminitrator or operator account can edit StellarOne component update schedule.

step.cmd: After the Schedule Update is switched on, radio buttons under Frequency and Star Time selection field appear, enabling users to schedule component update for the agent(s.)

li.p: The default setting for Weekly update is every Sunday.
The default setting for Monthly update is on day 01
The default setting for Start Time is 00:00.

note.p: Since not every month contains the date 29th, 30th, or 31st, e.g., Feburary only has 28 days (29 days on a leap year), it is recommended to select The last day of the month for monthly update frequency. This helps prevent the system from bypassing the update in the month that does not contain the date 29th, 30th, or 31st.
